title: Looking for a Duo

embed.description: Mastery 7 Mundo / Silver 1 18LP / 105W 90L Win Ratio 54% / Kled - 32W 17L Win Ratio 65%, Dr. Mundo - 21W 13L Win Ratio 62%, Katarina - 6W 12L Win Ratio 33%, Yasuo - 9W 7L Win Ratio 56%, Annie - 6W 9L Win Ratio 40%

body:
I am a High Silver Player (Silver 1 At the Moment), im looking for someone to duo with as not all of my friends are dedicated enough to play ranked regularly, i main Jungle / Top as my roles and would prefer to not move them but i play a very strong draven if put into bot lane and can pick up any support, mostly morg or thresh or any tanks if autofilled into support. I'm a calm player over chat but in discord i might vent. i Main {{champion:427}} and{{champion:240}}  but i am definentaly not restricted to those champs.

Looking for preferably a 1. Dedicated player, 2. Reliably smart, 3. Optional but preferred if you were relatively skilled

if you are interested at all add me or msg me your username in the comments and ill add you. i play ivern jungle and kled top i can do relatively good but i lack when it comes to shot calling so i cant usually carry a game on my own

replies.body: Give me an add if you're keen gold two willing to learn with you :)

Hello there, I'm an ADC main who just got out of silver and I logged in to comment that the best way to climb is to focus on getting better at the game, since solo/duo q puts you with 3 or 4 (whether you are duo or not) random teammates, you must play a good champion that carries but also is comfortable and fun-ish (you don't play ranked for fun do you now?) to you. And if you feel tilted/tired, stop playing because you most probably aren't going to reach that next division like that.
TLDR; focus on getting better at a role (or two). Lower your champion pool to 4 and perfect their mechanics. Play champs that can carry solo. DONT RELY TOO MUCH ON TEAMMATES CAUSE THEY ARE BOOSTED APES. And last but not least... GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD  GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD  GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD  GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD  GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD GIT GUD

I understand what you are saying, Kled is a hyper carry up there with the best of em and Ivern can baby sit any ape from what i can see the only problem is i like being able to create a monster on my team with him and therefore i would prefer if i could be able to communicate with that monster personally, is that not the purpose of a duo?
